name: iframe
description: Iframe used to render content from a specified URL

target.description: Target URL of external content for iframe. Should be HTTPS only

height.description: iFrame's height in pixels or percentage

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

cookieConsentRequiredMessage.comment: Localized text for cookie consent required message
cookieConsentRequiredMessage.value: Cookie consent required to load this content. See cookie banner on the page for more details.
